channel.title: Firebase on Henrik Fogelberg
channel.description: Recent content in Firebase on Henrik Fogelberg

item.title: Authenticating a Vue JS Application With Firebase UI
item.description: If you’re a startup, an indie developer or just working on some side project in Vue JS, chances are that you will be thinking of using Firebase for storage. This might very well be a good idea: Firebase is really easy to use and has quite a generous free plan. Of course nothing is completely free. If whatever you are working on does take off it could get expensive. But that’s perhaps a bit of a luxury problem.
